sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { NgOptimizedImage } from "@angular/common"; import { FadeDirective } from "../../directives/fade.directive"; @Component({ selector: "app-about", templateUrl: "./about.component.html", styleUrls: ["./about.component.scss"], standalone: true, imports: [NgOptimizedImage, FadeDirective] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About Me

An enthusiastic Junior Software Developer based in South Africa,Pretoria

Passionate and dedicated Junior Software Developer with 2 years of professional experience. I bring a solid foundation from working on live projects and am eager to contribute to your team's success. Proactive collaborator with a hunger for continuous learning. Let's build something amazing together!
